thread.title: Jacki Carr
thread.title_full: The Birth Poster betygsatt av Jacki Carr

author: Jacki Carr
title: Jacki Carr
text:
I am in love with my BIrthPoster. It is a beautiful reminder of my daughter's size as she continues to grow bigger and bigger. And how fun for her to get to interact and see it one day, too!
I have a vision of having all my children's birth post lining a wall in the future in my log cabin of a home. Thank you BirthPoster!
